document.full_text: people who smoke menthol cigarettes are no more likely to develop lung cancer than those who smoke non-menthol varieties, u.s. researchers said on wednesday in a surprise finding that could affect u.s. regulators' efforts to ban menthol-flavored cigarettes.
document.title: menthol cigarettes no more risky, study suggests
lines_and_colors: people who smoke menthol cigarettes are no more likely to develop lung cancer than those who smoke non-menthol varieties, u.s. researchers said on wednesday in a surprise finding that could affect u.s. regulators' efforts to ban menthol-flavored cigarettes.
